The Quranic researcher, if you have a good, are sure, then all of those you imitate them and take them with them are present, and this is a closeness to them for their goodness in their hands.For their miracle and the night of the lying, where they appear that there is no way for them or a trick in the savings from what they are in that the righteous of the disbelievers is in the disbelief The intercourse of the liars on the Day of Religion, and the disobedience of the believers in the shadows of the shadow of a shadow against the sacrifice, which is better than the one, is the one who is said to be the shadow of the night, and it is the shadow A position that the sun did not reach a shadow, and it is not said that the sun is still from the sun (P-178), and it is also expressed by the grace, and the glory of the glory, and the glory of the glory, and the glory of this What is desired is what is in the verse and those who are repeated from what is known, and supported by what was presented in the interviewer, they went to the shadow of three peoples, etc.What is meant by his saying is exalted.
